[imath] G(t)=\frac{4 t}{t+1} \quad \quad \quad \begin{array}{ll}{} & {\text { samol } \atop \text { supsel }} \\ {} & {\text { apple }}\end{array} [/imath]\n[imath] G^{\prime}(t)=?
